metadata.title: Feature and performance upgrade from RH850/F1K

sections.content:
Question:
What are differences between RH850/F1KM-S2 and F1K?
Answer:
There are several features and performance from RH850/F1K to F1KM-S2 even they have the same 2MB code flash size. The max. CPU clock is increased from 120MHz on F1K to 240MHz on F1KM-S4. Instead of ICUS on F1K, F1KM-S2 has ICUM. Data flash is increased from 64KB to 128KB. Additional 64KB RAM is also available on F1KM-S2.
Suitable Products
RH850/F1Kx
